altTitles.ja: 家族ごっこはもうやめます

description.en:
Adopted from a poor, rural orphanage by a wealthy duke, Naviah Agnus wanted nothing but to win her new father’s heart. Despite her best efforts, the calculating Duke only sees Naviah as a pawn, a mere stand-in for his terminally ill daughter Vivian, who was set to marry the crown prince. But when Vivian miraculously recovers, Naviah is pushed aside and driven to her own death. When she wakes up, she is 8 years old again, but this time, Naviah is done playing nice. Can they ever really become family?

---
"Navia Agnes," adopted to marry the Crown Prince on behalf of Duke Agnes's daughter with a time limit. 

“I really want to be family.” Navia, who held on to her family’s affection, did her best to become an Empress even while being abused. However, once Vivian, the Duke’s real daughter, is cured, she is abandoned by her family. 

No, it would be right to say that she was abandoned on all occasions. “Just how much more effort do I have to make? If I want to be your family.” Navia took off her blood-soaked gloves. 

Then on her right wrist, a number that couldn’t be seen by others appeared. 

"1" 

She calmly admitted, looking down on the number. “I’m going to stop playing with my family now.” At that moment, the number on her wrist changed. 

"0" 

Just like that, her life began again. 

“If you messed with me, you’re gonna pay for it.” Will she be able to find a temporary family who will protect her until she becomes of age, and get revenge on Duke Agnes?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)
description.fr:
Navia Agnès est une orpheline adoptée pour épouser le prince héritier et remplacer la fille malade du duc d'Agnès.

«Je voulais juste une vraie famille.»

Navia fait son possible pour obtenir l'affection de sa famille et devenir une bonne impératrice tout en étant maltraitée, mais au moment où Vivian, la fille biologique du duc, est guérie, sa famille adoptive l'abandonne. Et pas qu'une fois, il serait juste de dire que cela est devenu une habitude.

«Combien de fois dois-je encore essayer? Comment avoir enfin une vraie famille?»

Navia enlève ses gants imbibés de sang et sur son poignet droit, un numéro visible par elle seule est révélé.

«Un.»

Regardant le chiffre, elle se calme et décide d'arrêter les jeux de familles. Au moment de sa décision, le numéro sur son poignet change.

«ZÉRO.»

C'est le début d'une nouvelle vie, le commencement pour trouver une nouvelle famille et le départ d'une vengeance.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)
